markdown:
­

About Us - BridgeWork Partners

[Open sliding top](https://bridgeworkpartners.com/about-us/#)

## About Us

Award winning, BridgeWork Partners, is a high value consultative human resources company that strategically leverages 6 Pillars to aggressively support the demanding needs of our clients:

1\. BridgeWorkSEARCH

2\. BridgeWorkTECH

3\. BridgeWorkSTAFF

4\. BridgeWorkHR

5\. BridgeWorkSLED

6\. BridgeWorkRPO

We believe this approach allows us to best leverage the strengths of our internal team, Channel Partners, Mentor Protégé Recruiting Program, and Advisory Council to best meet our clients’ needs as an “In Business for Business,” HR Model. BridgeWork Partners is based in Dallas, Texas and supports clients locally, nationally, and internationally.

![](https://bridgeworkpartners.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/6-Pillars-2025-transparent-bkd-300x294.png)

BridgeWork Partners has been a 2016 & 2018 BestPlacestoWorkWinner by the Dallas Business Journal!

![null](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20286%20343'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

### Services

We offer 5 Pillars with high impact strategies and quality talent to drive positive results to meet the needs of our clients.

[Read More](http://bridgeworkpartners.com/services/)

![null](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20364%20364'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

### Core Values

BridgeWork Partners is built upon the commitment to three Core Values:

1\. Community

2\. Customer

3\. Culture

[Read More](http://bridgeworkpartners.com/about-us/core-values/)

![null](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20359%20278'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

### Leadership Team

BridgeWork Partners’ executive team is committed to providing quality experiences of service partnerships to our staff, to our clients, and to our community.

[Read More](http://bridgeworkpartners.com/about-us/meet-our-team/)

![null](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20367%20334'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

### Diversity

Our Vision for Diversity & Inclusion is to embrace the vast cultures encompassing Diversity of mind and thought that we are exposed to as a business and social world.

[Read More](http://bridgeworkpartners.com/about-us/diversity/)

![null](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20392%20277'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

### BridgeWorkGIVES

Since the inception of our company, we believe the heartbeat and foundation of our company is built on our philanthropic ‘BridgeWorkGIVES program. Embracing this as one of our Core Values, will make us stronger individuals and a more cohesive society.

[Read More](http://bridgeworkpartners.com/about-us/giveback-program/)

## Certifications

[![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20300%20214'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://bridgeworkpartners.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/NCTRCA-logo.png)

[![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20300%20185'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://bridgeworkpartners.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/WOB_Signature-1024x630.jpg)

[![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20300%2089'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://bridgeworkpartners.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Texas-HUB.jpg)

[![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20300%20165'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://bridgeworkpartners.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/249.jpg)

[Back to top icon](https://bridgeworkpartners.com/about-us/)
